info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 6:26PM EDT until June 22 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL GREENE...SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE...NORTHEASTERN MONONGALIA AND NORTHERN PRESTON COUNTIES... At 626 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Masontown, or near Uniontown, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Uniontown, Masontown, Farmington, Point Marion, Fairchance, Smithfield, Nemacolin, New Salem, Markleysburg, Greensboro, Brandonville, and Chalkhill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
